devdoc.author: Daniel Chilvers*

checkLendingPoolAddressProviderAddress().details: maybe try and shorten the function name a bit

fetchATokenAddress(string).details: can't we find a contract to look up the token addresses for us?

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Manages depositing and withdrawing from Aave

checkLendingPoolAddress().notice: verify the address of the lending pool in use

checkLendingPoolAddressProviderAddress().notice: verify the address of the lending pool address provider

fetchATokenAddress(string).notice: returns the AToken address for a given _tokenif token not found returns dead address

updateLendingPoolAddress().notice: update the lending pool address from the address provider

withdrawAll().notice: don't send me funds if this function still exists
